name: Potioneer (Hundi)
description:
Potioneer is a small game made for the "My First GameJam 2022" in the time span of 2 weeks.

Attention, this is not the final game. I just want to see what you guys think about the game.

--------------------------------------

Tutorial:

You can press E to interact!

Interact with the counter to see the customer`s request!

1. Fill the caudron with water by interacting with it.

2. Get an ingredient from the boxes for the base potion and throw it into the cauldron.

3. Now pick other ingredients to give the potion new properties (order does not matter).

4. Interact withe the cauldron and sell the potion you made at the counter.

 Interact to get all ingredient effects.  Interact to clear your hand/inventory.
